subject: Football
Small Cars (Compact, Subcompact and Microcars)
Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
lead_paragraph: Danny Clark, a 6-foot-2, 245-pound linebacker who plays for the Giants, eschewed the S.U.V.’s preferred by his peers for a two-door Smart car.
snippet: Danny Clark, a 6-foot-2, 245-pound linebacker who plays for the Giants, eschewed the S.U.V.’s preferred by his peers for a two-door Smart car.
